content.rendered:
Kids Martial Arts Classes

If you’re looking for kids martial arts classes in Lakeland, Florida there’s no better place for your kids to develop valuable life skills like discipline, character, and self-control than our program. Whether you’re looking for a kids martial arts program or something else for your children, Sifu Och Wing Chun runs a program unlike any other.

The program is taught personally by internationally-trained Wing Chun kung fu instructor, Sifu Justin Och so your child gets personal attention from a practitioner who understands both his craft and the keys to providing a disciplined, fun environment. The Sifu Och kids martial arts classes teaches critical life skills while providing plenty of exercise and boosting each child’s confidence and self-esteem.

Book A 2 Week Trial Now

2 WEEK FREE TRIAL & Access to our full schedule

Fill out the form below to get 2 FREE weeks of training at our downtown lakeland facility and access to our full class schedule!

Our Programs

We offer a variety of programs for you to choose from! It’s our goal to make sure that we find the right fit for you and your child and give them the best martial arts and/or after school experience we can provide.

To the left is our current roster of additional programs on top of the Kids Martial Arts classes we offer throughout the week. From after school pickup, to summer & holiday camps, and even our weekend Little Lions class,we’ll make sure to tailor an experience that will help your child reach their full potential!
Start Now with a 2 Week Trial

Kid’s Martial Arts

Little Lions

Summer Camps

After School Program

“When my 4yo first started coming here he cried so much and had no interest in participating with the class. The teachers were always patient and talked him through it. He loves his class now and always looks forward to going.”

— Ashley V,

(Parent of student for 2+ years)

Meet Our Kids Class Instructors!

(Check out our dedicated team of instructors, coaches, and advanced level students who teach and assist in class on a weekly basis! Click on their image to read their bio and learn about the instructors involved in our daily kids martial arts classes.)

— Carlie B.,

(Parent of student for 3+ years)

Kids After School Program

The Wing Chun martial arts after school programs also offers after school art programs in Lakeland, theatrical theatre performance and child etiquette. Our After school martial arts program teaches a multitude of classes which allows kids to choose one location to get the martial arts as well as the arts.

With our After School pickup and drop off program your child is placed in a school that seeks to uplift and enrich them at every turn. Your child is not another number, we pride ourselves on teaching and educating kids and adults in the rare southern kung fu system of Wing Chun Kung Fu under the Ip Man Lineage. Your child will also learn the black belt techniques from Karate and Taekwondo as well as skills in Jiujitsu, Boxing, and Judo. Our classes teach focus through encouragement, fun and discipline. | Get more information on our Kids After School Program

Learn More about Our Afterschool Program

See all

Kids Summer Camps

If you are looking for kids summer camps in Lakeland Florida then you have a wide array of opportunities to choose from. There are so many summer camps to choose from, deciding which is the best may be the toughest part for you and your child. There is a big difference between what each summer camps offer and provide.

Sifu Och Wing Chun Kung Fu has teamed up with Just Dance Studios to offer an unforgettable experience to children of all ages. With our unique location and highly qualified instructors you can be sure your child is in a safe and educational environment. As the summer season approaches, you may be considering sending your children to an action packed summer camp where they can experience a whole range of activities. | Get more information on Kids Summer Camps

Learn More About Our Summer Camps

Kids Holiday Day Camps

When you typically have your kids in school, holidays, teacher work days, and other school closings can affect your ability to earn a living. Sifu Och Wing Chun’s Lakeland holiday day camps program provides a place where your children can learn valuable skills while helping your scheduling needs.

Our holiday day camps program is already part of our Lakeland after school martial arts program, but you can also block out days of the year so that you’re all set when the schedule shifts and you need someone to care for your kids during those non-school days. If you live in Lakeland, Florida there’s no better place for your kids to learn discipline, participate in character-building programs, and pick up some helpful self-defense techniques while being well cared for by a professional team of instructors and teachers. | Get more information on Kids Holiday Day Camps

Learn More About Our Holiday Camps

“I have had nothing short of an amazing experience. I have had 3 children attend classes at Sifu och Wing Chen. The instructors knew each kid by name and they gave each kid their attention. The life lessons they teach the kids are irreplaceable.”

— Amanda S,

See a glimpse into what our classes are about

It’s important that we keep the classes high energy but structured to make sure our students are learning discipline while building their skills in the martial arts. Whether it be our Little Lions Class for our 3-5 year olds or our After School or Summer Camp programs for kids of all ages, we’re dedicated to providing the best martial arts program in all of the Central Florida area.

Start now by signing up to our two week training trial with the form below!
